titles.title: President Ronald W. Reagan resolution
A resolution honoring President Ronald Wilson Reagan.
A resolution honoring President Ronald Wilson Reagan.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary:
Notes with deep sorrow and solemn mourning the death of Ronald Wilson Reagan, the 40th President of the United States.
Extends the Senate's heartfelt sympathy to the wife and family of President Reagan.
Commends the former President for his presidency and its many accomplishments.
Calls on all the people of the United States to reflect on the former President's record during this national period of remembrance.
